definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: Circumstances, we come to the connection of the South Korean journalists stationed Zhang Ling.
sentences.chinese: 具体情况，我们来连线本台驻韩国记者张玲。

sentences.english: Welcome to listen to this the weather forecast which issued for you.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎收听本台为您发布的天气预报。

sentences.english: This station is now going off the air until tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 本台今天播音到此结束，明天见。

sentences.english: Fairchild TV and Talentvision reserve the right to make substitutions in the event of non-availability of any prize.
sentences.chinese: 如未能提供所述之奖品，本台保留更改奖品的权利。

sentences.english: We come to the connection details of the South Korean journalists stationed Zhang Ling.
sentences.chinese: 详细情况我们来连线本台驻韩国记者张玲。

sentences.english: Here is a report from our education correspondent.
sentences.chinese: 现播送一篇本台教育专栏记者的报道。

definition: regular column or segment (in a publication or broadcast program)/program (TV or radio)
specially engaged/employed or commissioned for a special task
the current period/this term (usually in finance)
chief editor (of newspaper)/abbr. for 總編輯|总编辑
editor in charge (abbr. for 責任編輯|责任编辑[ze2 ren4 bian1 ji2])
to broadcast over a network/(radio or TV) hookup/simulcast
